comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: This was a very popular location for photographers. I did some investigation with BobMeade/lifeasdaddy on this similar Henry King photo, but never found out if it was 1887 for Queen Victoria's Jubilee, or 1888 for the Centennial (or maybe another year) - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3593600145/] There are related photos in Photo Investigator, from the same location and minutes apart - investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/photo.asp... investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/photo.asp... investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/photo.asp...

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: I think those photos are of the same ships.   But the wind has changed.  Not sure about "minutes" ,  maybe hours apart.
